steps.conclusion: The title violates the language exam rule: it must be exactly the exam name. Provided title is "Preparatório para TOEFL" instead of "TOEFL". This also conflicts with the explicit expectation forbidding titles like "Preparatório para o TOEFL". Consequently, the english_title should have matched the exam name as well ("TOEFL"), but was "TOEFL Preparation".
None beyond the main rule violation. The output language, single suggestion constraint, icon prefix, and title length are correct.
Use the exact exam name as the title: "TOEFL". Set english_title to "TOEFL". Keep is_language_course=true, retain a tabler- icon, and keep a concise one-sentence description in Portuguese.
